name: Adventure Awaits
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Good, we're all here. Let's get started!"

name: Akoum Hellhound
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellhound gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hellhound packs roam the Spikefields, basking in the harsh sunlight and lighting the night with their flames.

name: Angelheart Protector
oracle_text: When Angelheart Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: "We shall persevere."

name: Anticognition
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {2}. If an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, instead counter that spell, then scry 2.
flavor_text:
"I think not."
—Flekon the Mindcensor

name: Ardent Electromancer
oracle_text: When Ardent Electromancer enters the battlefield, add {R} for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Trust me, we won't need torches."

name: Blood Beckoning
oracle_text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was kicked, instead return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Blood Price
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: Blood is the oldest currency.

name: Broken Wings
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text: Getting airborne with a kitesail is easy. It's everything afterward that takes focus, skill, and luck.

name: Bubble Snare
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Enchant creature
When Bubble Snare enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Canopy Baloth
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Canopy Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"You can almost see it calculating—are we a tasty enough treat to risk the jump?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Cascade Seer
oracle_text: When Cascade Seer enters the battlefield, scry X, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Perhaps you can't see the path, but that doesn't mean it isn't there."

name: Chilling Trap
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Serves you right for rushing ahead."
—Kaliea, Sea Gate trapfinder

name: Cleansing Wildfire
oracle_text:
Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Every rebirth looks like a death.

name: Cleric of Chill Depths
oracle_text: Whenever Cleric of Chill Depths blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "Before my people turned to false gods, we built a glittering city beneath the northern sea ice. The magic of ancient Benthidrix lives in me!"

name: Cliffhaven Kitesail
oracle_text:
When Cliffhaven Kitesail enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Made from canvas, wood, and hope.

name: Cliffhaven Sell-Sword
flavor_text: "I swing a sword. It's a simple life. A lot of adventurers just see me as some cheap muscle, but if my steel lets them return home with their lives and limbs intact, then I've done my job."

name: Cunning Geysermage
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Cunning Geysermage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Come on, Skitch, we'll lose them in the geyserfield."

name: Dauntless Survivor
oracle_text: When Dauntless Survivor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "I've got a little surprise for you, beasties! Come and get it!"

name: Dauntless Unity
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.

name: Deadly Alliance
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "He could handle any one of us, but he's no match for all of us!"

name: Deliberate
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card.
flavor_text: "I can't see all that the future holds, but I can keep us one step ahead of death."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "From legend it was forged, and to legend it returns."

name: Drana's Silencer
oracle_text: When Drana's Silencer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Hush."

name: Dreadwurm
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Dreadwurm gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: Its silent slithering belies its bulk.

name: Expedition Champion
oracle_text: Expedition Champion gets +2/+0 as long as you control another Warrior.
flavor_text: Warriors are combat specialists who bring their deadly skills to bear against the many foes that adventurers face in the course of their journeys.

name: Expedition Diviner
oracle_text:
Flying
As long as you control another Wizard, Expedition Diviner has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavor_text: Wizards' spells twist the fabric of reality to channel elemental energies, peer into the future, and even calm the Roil.

name: Expedition Healer
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Expedition Healer has lifelink as long as you control another Cleric.
flavor_text: In any adventuring party, the cleric is the heart: healing wounds, inspiring courage, and raising morale.

name: Expedition Skulker
oracle_text: Expedition Skulker has deathtouch as long as you control another Rogue.
flavor_text: Rogues bring an array of useful skills to the work of an adventuring party: stealth, agility, the ability to locate and disarm traps, and a subtle, deadly fighting style.

name: Farsight Adept
oracle_text: When Farsight Adept enters the battlefield, you and target opponent each draw a card.
flavor_text: "I've walked every one of the Teetering Peaks and never set a foot wrong. I can get you to safety."

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Field Research
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Draw two cards. If this spell was kicked, draw three cards instead.
flavor_text: "In the field, speed-reading is a survival skill."

name: Fissure Wizard
oracle_text: When Fissure Wizard enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: He might call up a burst of lava or a raging hellion from Akoum's volcanic depths. Or he might just fall in.

name: Ghastly Gloomhunter
oracle_text:
Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Flying, lifelink
If Ghastly Gloomhunter was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: Stinking, silent death.

name: Glacial Grasp
oracle_text:
Tap target creature. Its controller mills two cards. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
Draw a card.

name: Gnarlid Colony
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
If Gnarlid Colony was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.

name: Grotag Bug-Catcher
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Grotag Bug-Catcher attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Everybody grab a leg!"

name: Guul Draz Mucklord
oracle_text: When Guul Draz Mucklord dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Death comes in many forms on Guul Draz, most of them slow, subtle, and agonizing. At least a monstrous crocodile offers a swift death.

name: Hagra Constrictor
oracle_text:
Hagra Constrictor enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has menace. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Highborn Vampire
flavor_text: With the bloodchiefs annihilated in the fight between the free and enthralled, the swamps around Malakir are full of dangerous, young vampires eager to make their marks.

name: Inordinate Rage
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text:
"In my years wandering this land I've seen a veritable menagerie of fantastic creatures, but one that has eluded me thus far is the fabled 'easygoing minotaur.'"
—Ko, expedition wizard

name: Into the Roil
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
flavor_text: In theory, the death of the Eldrazi should have stilled the Roil. It did not.

name: Joraga Visionary
oracle_text: When Joraga Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "If you only follow where the paths lead, you merely go where others have gone before you."

name: Kabira Outrider
oracle_text: When Kabira Outrider enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: Ondu moas make wildly uncomfortable mounts, but for determined warriors, their speed is enough to make up for it.

name: Kazandu Nectarpot
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The scythe-like forelegs are crucial for its survival, because it tastes really good and every inhabitant of Murasa knows it."
—Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

name: Kazandu Stomper
oracle_text:
Trample
When Kazandu Stomper enters the battlefield, return up to two lands you control to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: Elves revere cycles of renewal, but they prefer cycles that don't involve their homes getting smashed.

name: Kor Celebrant
oracle_text: Whenever Kor Celebrant or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "The landbind ritual connects us to our sacred sites. More importantly, it binds us with every other kor who has visited here, through countless generations."

name: Living Tempest
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text:
"If you don't like the weather, just wait a few minutes and it'll change ... probably for the worse."
—Amandi, kitesail expert

name: Makindi Ox
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text:
"May bloodflies empty your veins and turn you into a dried leather sack, cow!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Malakir Blood-Priest
oracle_text: When Malakir Blood-Priest enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "From your veins to mine."

name: Marauding Blight-Priest
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "The vampires never had gods. We followed our bloodchiefs. Now they are gone. What is left? Destruction and death, my friends. That is enough."

name: Mesa Lynx
oracle_text: As long as it's not your turn, Mesa Lynx gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: Its ferocity is tempered by patience, knowing it must wait for just the right moment to strike a killing blow.

name: Might of Murasa
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: The continent of Murasa is defined by irrepressible growth, both natural and otherwise.

name: Mind Drain
oracle_text: Target opponent discards two cards, mills a card, and loses 1 life. You gain 1 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: "The meal was exquisite. The conversation, less so."

name: Molten Blast
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Molten Blast deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Life among the sudden tremors and violent eruptions of Akoum demands a healthy fear of both.

name: Murasa Brute
flavor_text: Some adventuring parties are made up of old friends, their common bonds bolstering them in the face of peril. Other parties simply hire the biggest, meanest muscle they can find.

name: Nahiri's Binding
oracle_text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: "This is my world, Jace, down to its very bones."

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: "The ancient kor were a clever bunch with a taste for nasty traps. Spikes, poison, fire pouring forth with no warning . . . I've seen and disabled them all. If you intend to raid a Skyclave, you'd be wise to hire me on."

name: Nimana Skitter-Sneak
oracle_text: As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Nimana Skitter-Sneak gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: "When navigating dangerous terrain, one hundred legs are better than two."

name: Nimana Skydancer
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Nimana Skydancer enters the battlefield, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: The Free City of Nimana is a great place to recruit adventurers with shady skill sets.

name: Nissa's Zendikon
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 4/4 Elemental creature with reach and haste. It's still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Oblivion's Hunger
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Draw a card if that creature has a +1/+1 counter on it. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)
flavor_text:
"Indulge the void. Become the void. Consume all you touch."
—Drana, the last bloodchief

name: Practiced Tactics
oracle_text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Practiced Tactics deals damage to that creature equal to twice the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: Each individual has their own crucial role to play.

name: Pressure Point
oracle_text:
Tap target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Poke a drake in the right place and it becomes as docile as a pet. Poke it in the wrong place and goodbye, hand.

name: Prowling Felidar
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Prowling Felidar.
flavor_text: On occasion, felidars leave meaty "gifts" outside the tents of explorers they consider worthy.

name: Pyroclastic Hellion
oracle_text: When Pyroclastic Hellion enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand. When you do, Pyroclastic Hellion deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
"The difference between a hellion and a volcano is that volcanoes don't get hungry."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Rabid Bite
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text: A healthy felidar is voracious yet regal. A rabid felidar is nothing more than appetite lashed to frothing jaws.

name: Reclaim the Wastes
oracle_text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, search your library for two basic land cards instead of one.

name: Resolute Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Warrior, you may attach an Equipment you control to it.
flavor_text:
"If you practice something often enough, it becomes part of you. That's why we train, and that's why we survive."
—Tasha, Graypelt veteran

name: Risen Riptide
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, Risen Riptide has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Most days the sea is my friend. But only most days."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Roil Eruption
oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Roil Eruption deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage instead.
flavor_text:
"Our feeble villages and tiny encampments stand only at the whim of the Roil."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Scale the Heights
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. You gain 2 life. You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Ever onward, ever skyward."

name: Scavenged Blade
oracle_text:
When Scavenged Blade enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Scorch Rider
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
When Scorch Rider enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Lava flows where it pleases. I'm just happy to be along for the ride!"

name: Seafloor Stalker
oracle_text: {4}{U}: Seafloor Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Sunken ruins? My specialty."

name: Sea Gate Banneret
oracle_text: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Sea Gate Expeditionary House was founded after the discovery of the Skyclave over Tazeem. Now its banners fly over every corner of Zendikar.

name: Sea Gate Colossus
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text:
"When you are battered and exhausted, look up and be inspired by its resolve."
—Tazri

name: Shell Shield
oracle_text:
Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature you control gets +0/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature also gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Shepherd of Heroes
oracle_text:
Flying
When Shepherd of Heroes enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Rest, friends. I will protect you."

name: Sizzling Barrage
oracle_text: Sizzling Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature that blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"A thousand sparks can burn through your defenses just as quickly as one massive blaze."
—Attikar, Akoum elementalist

name: Skyclave Sentinel
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Flying, defender
If Skyclave Sentinel was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
As long as Skyclave Sentinel has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

name: Skyclave Squid
oracle_text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Squid can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: An ancient sea monster dragged the Murasa Skyclave under the waves, then smaller sea monsters moved in.

name: Smite the Monstrous
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"Darkness always flees from the light, and I am the breaking dawn."
—Kordain, luminarch of Kabira

name: Sneaking Guide
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "I swear, it's a shortcut."

name: Spare Supplies
oracle_text:
Spare Supplies enters the battlefield tapped.
When Spare Supplies enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spare Supplies: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"It's better to carry a little extra weight than to find yourself halfway down a baloth's throat with no knife."
—Doral, Bala Ged guide

name: Spitfire Lagac
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Spitfire Lagac deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
"If you hear a choking sort of cough, it's about to get really hot."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Stonework Packbeast
oracle_text:
Stonework Packbeast is also a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: It will happily carry home your treasure or drag you back to civilization, as circumstances demand.

name: Strength of Solidarity
oracle_text: Choose target creature you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "This expedition doesn't succeed unless we all succeed!"

name: Subtle Strike
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: Silence is an underrated hunting strategy.

name: Synchronized Spellcraft
oracle_text: Synchronized Spellcraft deals 4 damage to target creature and X damage to that creature's controller, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
flavor_text: "Ready? One... two..."

name: Tajuru Blightblade
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: Ora Ondar, the Khalni Garden, is a lush tangle of growth in the harsh lands of Akoum. Its plant growth is marvelously diverse: a brilliant spectrum of vibrant life . . . and speedy death.

name: Tajuru Snarecaster
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Elves of the Tajuru Nation spend their lives in the ancient jaddi trees' expansive canopy, some living and dying without ever touching the ground.

name: Tazeem Raptor
oracle_text:
Flying
When Tazeem Raptor enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"It's good to see the eagles circling the Lighthouse once again."
—Tazri

name: Tazeem Roilmage
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
When Tazeem Roilmage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "The Roil can be directed. Observe."

name: Teeterpeak Ambusher
oracle_text: {2}{R}: Teeterpeak Ambusher gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Goblins from the Makindi Trenches of Ondu make surprisingly skilled climbing guides due to their habit of scaling the cliffs to drop onto unsuspecting foes.

name: Territorial Scythecat
oracle_text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Territorial Scythecat.
flavor_text: Standing between a scythecat and its prey makes you the appetizer.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Kargan tribal lands rarely have issues with goblin raids. Coincidentally, they also rarely have issues keeping their dragons fed.

name: Tuktuk Rubblefort
oracle_text:
Defender, reach
Creatures you control have haste.
flavor_text: As with everything else, goblins believe fortifications benefit from as many spiky bits as possible.

name: Turntimber Ascetic
oracle_text: When Turntimber Ascetic enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "For so long, this land cried out in pain. Now, as the flow returns to its balance point, a new harmony echoes in the trees."

name: Utility Knife
oracle_text:
When Utility Knife enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "Hold on a second, I have just the thing."

name: Vanquish the Weak
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: Open conflict between expeditionary houses—or even individual adventuring parties—is discouraged, but "accidents" happen.

name: Zulaport Duelist
oracle_text:
Flash
When Zulaport Duelist enters the battlefield, up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Its controller mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
